What tips would you give so that you can gain rep fairly and rapidly.

What tips would you give so that you can gain rep fairly and rapidly.

Post everywhere. Make funny posts. Make ships. Make jokes. Be friendly and helpful. That seems to be what people are doing these days.

Post everywhere. Make funny posts. Make ships. Make jokes. Be friendly and helpful. That seems to be what people are doing these days.

This. Really, getting reputation is tricky. Some of the coolest ships out there hardly get any, but sometimes a single funny (or helpful, or just overwhelmingly true/relevant) post will get you several comments. Doing unique and interesting things is almost a surefire way to get some rep, like my Blender renders of other people's craft. (Which I assure you I'll be getting back to shortly!) Write a KSP fan fiction, or a tutorial. Whatever you choose to do is fine, do it well, like what you do, and if rep comes your way, even better.

Never strive for reputation for its face value, of which it has none. If that's all you want, then what you want is pointless.

Post everywhere. Make funny posts. Make ships. Make jokes. Be friendly and helpful. That seems to be what people are doing these days.

You don't need to post everywhere, but quoting people appears to be good way. After craft, of course. Post craft, post craft, and post more craft. And spend a long time on them, testing, building, refining. It will show. Also, replicas. People recognize craft from real life, and they rep it. If it doesn't look stock, or even better, not like KSP at all, so much the better. People rep craft because they enjoy looking at them. Make the release page enjoyable, and useful. If it has lots un-spoilered pictures, it will take to long to load. Same with animated gifs. Take your craft out for a photo shoot, to get the best pictures of it. Even if it would never look like that during flight. Imagine you're a kerbal, and take picture like you're looking at it from kerbal eye-level.

TL;DR, make replicas and present them like a movie.

Alternatively, bash squad and post in the "How many points to the next rep level" thread. Ideally, both.
